pkgmetadata.longdescription: **chgksuite** is an utility that helps chgk editors.[Chgk](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/What%3F_Where%3F_When%3F) (short for Chto? Gde? Kogda?) is a popular russian quiz.Project home on gitlab: https://gitlab.com/peczony/chgksuiteDocumentation (in Russian): https://peczony.gitlab.io/chgksuite
